privacy_characteristics: UK's largest commercial national and regional news publisher
Over 100 regional and national titles
Extensive use of Permutive for on-device audience segmentation
Member of Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
Uses Lotame DMP for data management and audience insight
Shares data with LiveRamp for identity resolution
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Ipsos Iris audience measurement panel participant
Significant programmatic advertising operation

dmg media.parent: Daily Mail and General Trust plc (DMGT)
privacy_characteristics: MailOnline is one of the world's most visited English-language newspaper websites
Significant programmatic advertising operation
Uses session replay tools for UX analysis
Extensive third-party cookie ecosystem
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Shares data with data brokers including CACI and Experian
Ipsos Iris audience measurement panel participant
DotMetrics digital audience measurement

independent digital news and media.parent: Independent Digital News and Media Ltd
privacy_characteristics: Digital-only national newspaper since 2016
All identified vendors already present in standard ad-tech databases
Standard programmatic advertising operation
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Uses standard consent management platform
Scott Trust ownership — operated for journalistic independence, not shareholder profit
Founding member of Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
Strong emphasis on reader-funded journalism alongside advertising
Uses Permutive for on-device audience segmentation (privacy-preserving approach)
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Lotame DMP for audience data management with Panorama identity resolution
Relatively contained ad-tech vendor footprint compared to tabloid publishers
Publicly funded broadcaster — distinct privacy obligations under Royal Charter
No programmatic advertising on domestic UK services
BBC Studios (commercial arm) has separate privacy policy for international services
Minimal ad-tech footprint as a public broadcaster
Uses Permutive for audience segmentation in-house
Uses Experian Mosaic geodemographic classification for audience insight
Shares hashed email data with social platforms for audience matching
Custom consent management rather than commercial CMP

news uk.parent: News Corp (via News UK & Ireland Limited)
privacy_characteristics: Part of News Corp global media group
Operates Octave Audio programmatic digital audio advertising platform
NC Audience Exchange (NewsIQ) provides cross-publisher identity tracking globally
NewsIQ cookie syncs across all News Corp properties worldwide (Sun, Times, WSJ, NY Post)
LiveRamp operates as joint controller rather than processor
Covatic SDK used for geolocation-based ad targeting in mobile apps
Ozone Project founding member (publisher advertising alliance)
Extensive vendor ecosystem with dedicated privacy portal (newsprivacy.co.uk)
Shares data with Experian for audience profiling and lookalike modelling
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Ipsos Iris and DotMetrics for audience measurement

financial times.parent: Nikkei Inc. (via The Financial Times Limited)
privacy_characteristics: Premium subscription model reduces reliance on advertising revenue
Notably lean and privacy-conscious ad-tech stack
Uses Google DoubleClick (AdX) for programmatic advertising
Does not name most vendors in privacy policy — refers generically to service providers
39 technology partners listed in consent manager but not individually named in policy
Session replay used for UX research (records scrolling, clicks, text entry)
Owned by Nikkei Inc. — shares subscriber data with parent for joint subscription offers
UK Cyber Essentials accredited
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework via Sourcepoint CMP
Business intelligence data retained for 36 months then aggregated
Founding member of Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
Premium subscription model alongside advertising
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Uses Permutive for audience segmentation
Broadcaster and pay-TV provider with extensive data collection
Part of Comcast/NBCUniversal global media group
Collects viewing habits across linear and on-demand services
Uses set-top box data for audience measurement
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Publicly owned, commercially funded broadcaster
Requires registration for All 4 streaming — collects viewer profiles
Pioneered data-driven advertising in UK broadcasting
Contextual and addressable advertising via 4Sales
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework

jpi media.parent: National World plc (operating as Iconic Media Group Ltd)
privacy_characteristics: Major regional newspaper publisher across UK
Formerly Johnston Press, acquired by National World in 2021
Now operating as Iconic Media Group Ltd
Participates in Ozone Project publisher advertising alliance
214 technology partners listed in Sourcepoint consent manager
LiveRamp operates as joint controller for identity resolution — hashed email shared for cross-device ad targeting
1PlusX AG (now TripleLift) used for cookies and audience data enrichment
118 Data Resource supplies third-party marketing contact lists to publisher
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Significant programmatic advertising operation across regional titles

newsquest.parent: Gannett Co. Inc. (via Newsquest Media Group Ltd)
privacy_characteristics: UK subsidiary of Gannett (US parent company owns USA Today)
Over 200 regional newspaper titles and magazines across UK
Also operates LOCALiQ digital marketing, s1 Jobs, and Exchange & Mart
LiveRamp operates as joint controller — hashed email shared for cross-device ad targeting
Third-party ad networks include Google AdEx, Magnite (Rubicon), and Criteo for behavioural retargeting
Experian used for credit reference and consumer data enrichment
ZoomInfo Technologies used as data broker to validate business contact details
Arkadium games platform with InMobi/Quantcast for ad serving and consent
HubSpot used for digital marketing automation
2AdPro in India receives personal data for ad production under EU model contracts
Audience extension enables advertisers to target Newsquest readers on other websites
Participates in IAB TCF v2 framework
Marketing contact lists reviewed and deleted after three years of inactivity
